description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/3809339561 at Tue Feb 21 19:57:51 UTC 2023

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", cluster="$cluster", container="query-frontend"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) / sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", cluster="$cluster", container="query-frontend"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)
sum by (reason) (kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", container="query-frontend"})

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against Query Frontend for the given time.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query-frontend"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate of requests

panels.description: Shows rate of queries passing through Query Frontend

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(thanos_query_frontend_queries_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", op="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate of queries

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against Query Frontend.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query-frontend",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query-frontend"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query-frontend"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query-frontend"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query-frontend"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

targets.expr: sum by (job, tripperware) (rate(cortex_cache_request_duration_seconds_count{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Show rate of Querier cache gets vs misses.

targets.expr: sum by (job, tripperware) (rate(querier_cache_gets_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, tripperware) (rate(querier_cache_misses_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Querier cache gets vs misses

panels.description: Shows rate of cortex fetched keys.

targets.expr: sum by (job, tripperware) (rate(cortex_cache_fetched_keys_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Cortex fetched keys

panels.description: Shows rate of cortex cache hits.

targets.expr: sum by (job, tripperware) (rate(cortex_cache_hits_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Cortex cache hits

title: nduff: query frontend
